activities: Maryman & Associates acts as a data processor on behalf of Clients and/or their legal counsel during the course of any of the following services: data recovery, electronic discovery, digital forensics and/or related consulting services. Client Personal Data may be collected in the EU by the Client directly or by Maryman & Associates personnel at the Client's direction. Client Personal Data may be sent to Maryman & Associates in the United States by the Client or by Maryman & Associates at the Client's direction.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)General Science & Technology - (GST)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
recoursemech: Any individual may refer a privacy issue to Bradley N. Maryman, President, Maryman & Associates. In the event the issue is not resolved, Maryman & Associates will agree to mediate the issue with the Los Angeles, CA, USA office of JAMS, a third-party dispute resolution service. An individual may file a request for mediation by calling JAMS at 213-620-1133.
